ezdb
Interface Table<H,V>

Type Parameters:
H - The type of the hash key for this key/value table.
V - The type of the value for this key/value table.
All Known Subinterfaces:
RangeTable<H,R,V>
All Known Implementing Classes:
EzLevelDbTable
public interface Table<H,V>

A key/value table.

Author:
criccomini

Method Summary
 void close()
          Close any open resources associated with this table.
 void delete(H hashKey)
          Delete a value for a given key.
 V get(H hashKey)
          Get a value for a given key.
 void put(H hashKey, V value)
          Put a value into the table, keyed by the hash key.
 

Method Detail

put

void put(H hashKey,
         V value)
Put a value into the table, keyed by the hash key. If a row already exists for the hash key, it should be overwritten.

Parameters:
hashKey - The unique key associated with a value.
value - The value to be persisted.

get

V get(H hashKey)
Get a value for a given key.

Parameters:
hashKey - The unique key associated with a value.
Returns:
The value, or null if no item matches the hash key.

delete

void delete(H hashKey)
Delete a value for a given key. If no value exists for a given key, this should be a no op.

Parameters:
hashKey - The unique key associated with a value.

close

void close()
Close any open resources associated with this table.
